name: LifeForm (PhilBlank, mobiusdisco, Axe)
description:
Grow your alien by solving mysterious puzzles!

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 46 by:

Grug - Programming Lead

Axe (https://acidinteractive.itch.io/) - Programming

Blank - Programming

Framk - Shaders/SFX

Goet - Programming

Kratos Aurion - Art

Mobiusdisco (https://twitter.com/mobiusdisco) - Music/SFX

Silpheed - Art/Programming
